effects: Crush the brain matter of a foe! Inflict 1d4 Damage and force them to lose a turn on a d6: 6+. /r/n Ignores ABSORPTION. In a skirmish, drop a skirmish counter by 1.
name: Psychic Implosion

effects: When you use a consumable, instead of discarding it, pass ARCHEOLOGY 6 to keep the Item or token by placing it on this card. It can be used once more before it is discarded. Only one Item at a time can be placed on this card.
name: Iconographer

effects: Deal an additional 1d4 Damage on a hit with a whip-type weapon.
name: Crack the Whip

effects: Restore 4 Vita to yourself or an adjacent ally. Usable during a skirmish.
name: Purification

effects: Inflict 1d6 Damage to any one Demonic, Spirit or Undead creature.
name: Blessing of the Cross

effects: All characters gain +5 Defense for the current encounter or skirmish.
name: Halo

effects: You land a punishing blow against your foe, dealing 1d6 Damage. If the result was 6, punch again to cause an additional 1d6 Damage. Repeat until the result isn't 6.
name: Punishment
